title: AI Developer | Software Engineer
summary: AI Developer with expertise in Python, React, and TensorFlow. Strong foundation in full-stack development, data structures, and algorithms. Experienced in building AI-driven applications, encryption systems, and scalable web platforms. Currently pursuing MCA with a focus on cybersecurity and DevOps. Passionate about creating innovative projects that combine AI, security, and modern software engineering practices.

bullets: Developed AI-powered resume screening tool using Python and ML for context-aware skill matching and prediction.
Built full-stack applications with React (frontend) and Node.js/Express/MongoDB (backend).
Integrated secure authentication and cloud storage in projects involving file encryption and management.
Created automation scripts and mini-projects in Python and Java to optimize workflows.
Designed encryption and decryption modules with secure password hashing and intrusion detection features.
Collaborated in team projects using Git for version control and agile practices.
Developed context-aware resume screening tool with ML-based prediction and recruiter dashboard.
Implemented GitHub/LinkedIn integration and ensured GDPR-compliant data privacy.
items.name: Resume Screening Tool
items.summary: AI-driven tool for automating resume filtering and candidate-job matching.

bullets: Built file management system that converts files into .cyp format for secure local and cloud storage.
Integrated authentication layer and encryption algorithms to protect sensitive data.
items.name: File Encryption & Management System
items.summary: Secure system for encrypting, storing, and accessing files with role-based authentication.

bullets: Developed collaborative product wishlist app with user authentication and real-time updates.
Implemented full-stack architecture using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
items.name: Collaborative Wishlist App
items.summary: Cross-platform web app for creating, sharing, and managing product wishlists collaboratively.

bullets: Designed responsive job seeker dashboard inspired by Naukri with JSP and Bootstrap.
Implemented profile management, job applications, and recruiter view.
items.name: Job Seeker Dashboard
items.summary: Full-stack web app for managing job search and recruiter interactions.

items.school: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) in Operation Theatre Technology
